title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' when selecting text. I had to switch to the Outline view to access it. Currently, the actions seem to be distributed based on personal taste. This should be changed. Users should be able to access all actions from the editor, either in the context menu or through a global menu like 'Edit'. It is not acceptable to force users to switch views.
OB: When selecting text, the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not available in the context menu.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action should be available in the context menu when selecting text.
SR: 1. Open the editor. 2. Select some text. 3. Right-click on the selected text and check if the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is available in the context menu. If not, try accessing it through the 'Edit' menu.
